info.title: Welcome!
info.body: To apply for a show, you need to answer a few questions. If you've got all the information to hand, it should take around 5-10 minutes.

member.title: Have you paid for Freshair membership through EUSA?

membership_bought.title: Buy Membership
membership_bought.body: You must be a paid member to have a show, cohost a show, produce, or be a part of a team. Please go to the FreshAir page on the EUSA website to purchase membership before continuing.

show_exists.title: Pre-existing show
show_exists.body: Have you done this show before?

inputs.placeholder: Describe your show in 100 words or fewer...

show_pic.title: Choose a show picture
show_pic.body: This will be shown on Freshair.org.uk to identify your show

producer_type.title: Producer preference

show_category.title: Category
